title: BRIGHTON GRAPHIC DESIGN font id
content:
Looking for a font ID on this lovely typeface used for Brighton Graphic Design & Illustration.

Thanks,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090816211937im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brighton_gdi09_6400.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [brighton\_gdi09.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090816211937/http:/typophile.com/files/brighton_gdi09.jpg) | 48.61 KB |
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content:
I believe that would be Router, from Incubator and available at Village:

[http://www.vllg.com/Incubator/Router/mudTyper+Weights/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090816211937/http:/www.vllg.com/Incubator/Router/mudTyper+Weights/ "http://www.vllg.com/Incubator/Router/mudTyper+Weights/")
